name: Strawberry Pound Cake
author: L.M. Black
summary: This strawberry pound cake is a recipe to write home to mama about.
ingredients: 1 ½ cups unsalted butter, at room temperature
1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature
directions: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Grease and flour a fluted tube pan (such as Bundt®)
Beat butter and cream cheese together in a large mixing bowl until smooth
Add sugar and beat until smooth and fluffy
Add vanilla extract and beat in eggs one at a time
Add 1 cup of flour and baking powder and mix until smooth
Beat in another 1 cup of flour until smooth; mix in remaining flour
Spoon batter into the prepared pan
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean, about 1 hour
Cool on a wire rack for 5 minutes
Run a table knife around the edges to loosen
Invert carefully onto a serving plate or cooling rack
